A short burst of rain couldn’t keep a crowd of veterans and their families from gathering outside the National Infantry Museum on Memorial Day morning to celebrate the addition of 224 new paver stones to its memorial.


Columbus men robbed at gunpoint on Steam Mill Road

May 22, 2015  |  Columbus Ledger-Enquirer

Two Columbus men were robbed at gunpoint in the 5000 block of Steam Mill Road, according to a report from police.


Columbus teen arrested for allegedly burglarizing car

May 21, 2015  |  Columbus Ledger-Enquirer

A Columbus man was arrested for allegedly taking $731 of property from a car.
